description: This file contains source code written in C that implements various utility functions related to device URI creation, timer event handling, and device request creation within the Sheens framework. It includes functions for parsing device IDs, generating JSON-RPC notifications, and constructing URIs for device resources, primarily for use in a smart device or home automation context.

methods.name: char * sheens_get_device_uri(const char * src,const char * resource)
methods.description: Constructs a device URI based on a legacy device ID, supporting three formats, and a resource identifier.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_timer_fired_object(const char * uuid)
methods.description: Creates a JSON-RPC notification object indicating a timer has fired, embedding the timer's UUID.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_timer_emit_object(uint32_t seconds,const char * uuid,cJSON * message)
methods.description: Creates a JSON-RPC notification to emit a timer, specifying seconds, UUID, and an optional message.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_timer_oneshot_request(uint32_t seconds,const char * action_js,cJSON * nodes_object,cJSON * start_branches)
methods.description: Creates a timer request for a one-shot timer with specified duration, JavaScript action, and related nodes and branches.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_write_device_request(const char * deviceId,const char * resource,const char * actionSuppressResourceURI,const char * value)
methods.description: Generates a JSON-RPC request to write a value to a device resource, constructing appropriate URIs for device identifiers and optional suppression resources.

ctags.name: sheens_create_write_device_request
ctags.signature: (const char * deviceId,const char * resource,const char * actionSuppressResourceURI,const char * value)

ctags.name: sheens_get_device_uri
ctags.pattern: /^char* sheens_get_device_uri(const char* src, const char* resource)$/
